abstract: Ryan Palmer shoots five-under-par 65, putting him in tie for fourth at Barclays, first event in FedEx Cup playoffs; Palmer's father Butch, with whom he was extremely close, died in a car accident in August, leaving him to simultaneously battle both deep grief and a challenging course.
lead_paragraph: Palmer, whose father recently died, shot a five-under-par 65 and was tied for fourth at the Barclays, the first event in the FedEx Cup playoffs.

headline.main: Ryan Palmer Plays On Despite a Painful Loss
headline.print_headline: American Plays On Despite a Painful Loss

snippet: Palmer, whose father recently died, shot a five-under-par 65 and was tied for fourth at the Barclays, the first event in the FedEx Cup playoffs.
